text: Ingaba sele belindele inzaliseko yokugqibela yesiganeko? NgeMini inzaliseko yesiganeko ifezekiswa3, abo babengayikhathalelanga ngaphambili baza kuthi: “Inene, uMthunywa weNkosi yethu wayezile nenyaniso, ngoku ingaba bakhona na abathetheleli bethu khon’ukuze basithethelele? Okanye mhlawumbi siza kubuyiselwa emva (kubomi basemhlabeni) khon’ukuze sikwazi ukuveza izenzo ezingezizo ezo sasikade sizenza?” Inene, bona balahlekelwe yimiphefumlo yabo ukanti oko babedla ngokukuqamba kubashiyile kwemka kubo
